name: Ruin The Fun
shortDescription: Cheat plugin, to ruin your fun, or to assist you in making or testing another plugin. https://github.com/Pshy0/es-ruin-the-fun
description: Ruin-The-Fun is a cheat/development plugin. Change your captain's name, choose the color swizzle of your ships, edit your reputation with other governments, set your combat rank, hire a powerful escort, gift yourself pre-outfitted ships, give yourself money, and much more. All ships and outfits are also available from a few added systems. https://github.com/Pshy0/es-ruin-the-fun

name: more.person.ships
shortDescription: This plugin adds more person ships to the different regions of the galaxy.
description: This plugin adds more person ships to the different regions of the galaxy. See the README for details.

name: Mega Freight
shortDescription: Adds several mostly civilian ships for you and npc merchants (and pirates) to use for more variety in human space. Updated to Unstable releases.
description: This plugin adds several civilian and some military ships to add some more variety to human space and beyond. Mostly focused around larger ships but also have smaller freighters and starter-level ships as well. Will be updated to be compatible with lastest unstable release.

name: more.boarding.missions
shortDescription: Adds lots of repeatable boarding and assisting missions for different factions. Boarding bigger ships give higher rewards or higher chances for credits or special items.
description: Adds lots of repeatable boarding and assisting missions for different factions. Boarding bigger ships give higher rewards or higher chances for credits or special items. See the README for details.

name: Rumskib
shortDescription: Content expansion.
description: Rumskib is a large content expansion with ships, planets, missions, and more.

name: Blended Ships
shortDescription: A spliced ships plugin for Endless Sky where all the ships are made in Blender.
description: Blended Ships is the realistic spliced ship plugin. All these ships have thumbnails, believeable stats, and actual potential uses! There is also a greater variety of civilian ships available, to support various playstyles.

name: SpaceCrate
shortDescription: A trade oriented mod for Endless Sky.
description: SpaceCrate adds planet X-283N1 in the Alpha Centauri system. A rapidly developing world obsessed with trade and exports. Run by CEO Arnan de Gans this obsession attracts workers from many planets and results in lucrative trade.

name: Capture Archons
shortDescription: Spawns captureable Archon ships
description: Spawns captureable Archon ships in the system "Persitar" every ten minutes. PS - Pre-existing Archons can't be captured nor will they be angered. Capturing the spawned Archons will not be any easier.

name: Celestial Strands
shortDescription: Celestial Strands is a plug-in for Endless Sky that adds a new area of content based on the original Escape Velocity games, primarily Escape Velocity Override.
description: Celestial Strands brings content from the original Escape Velocity series, primarily Escape Velocity Override, to Endless Sky in a new playable area. The plug-in focuses on the various factions of the Crescent, including the Strands, Zachit, and Miranu, and their presence in a new, young galaxy. Will the Strands reunite once more under the same banner, or will inner turmoil be their undoing yet again?

name: licenses
shortDescription: Adds several side missions to acquire unobtainable licenses.
description: Adds several side missions to acquire unobtainable licenses. See the README for details.

name: human.labels
shortDescription: Reworks the Human area labels and adds area borders.
description: Reworks the Human area labels and adds area borders. See the README for details.

name: coalition.shopping
shortDescription: Adds all Coalition/Heliarch/Lunarium outfits and ships to 'Far Home' in the 'Homeward' system.
description: Adds all Coalition/Heliarch/Lunarium outfits and ships to 'Far Home' in the 'Homeward' system. See the README for details.

name: Disable Free Worlds
shortDescription: Exactly what it says on the tin. Disables all events related to the main plot, along with the Pact Recon mission chain.
description: Exactly what it says on the tin. Disables all events related to the main plot, along with the Pact Recon mission chain.

name: Lampyrid Start
shortDescription: Enables an alternate start wherein the player starts with a modified Lampyrid.
description: Have you ever wanted to start Endless Sky flying something a bit more unique than the typical shuttle, starbarge, or sparrow? Have you dreamed of having a pilot that starts their carreer with an old ship they've been fixing up for the past few years? Well, Lampyrid Start does that. Choosing this starts has your pilot start their career flying a slighly modified version of the Lampyrid, which is a decent balanced transport/freighter with the capacity to be fairly fast compared to others of its class.

name: Old Bounty Hunting Missions
shortDescription: Replaces timed bounty hunting missions with the old untimed ones.
description: Feel like the timed bounty missions in Endless Sky are too fast for your taste? Want to stack those jobs, perhaps as a challenge for a ship build or just for that satisfying feeling of credits rolling in after a long patrol? Then this plugin is for you :)

name: boss.loot
shortDescription: A series of dungeon-like boss encounters for a single ship. With loottables and weapon upgrade mechanism.
description: A series of dungeon-like boss encounters for a single ship. With loottables and weapon upgrade mechanism. See the README for details.

name: disable.person.ships
shortDescription: Disables all person ships.
description: Disables all person ships. See the README for details.

name: World Forge
shortDescription: A plugin for Endless Sky that allows the player to access everything in the game in one place.
description: A plugin for Endless Sky that allows the player to access everything in the game in one place. Includes features that the all-content plugin does not have such as the ability to boost your combat rating and change your friendly/hostile status with factions of the game without having to save-edit. Intended to help content creators test their plugins.

name: quarg.farm
shortDescription: Adds a new system 'Saquerver' (between human and coalition space) where you can farm a new Quarg faction. Also the death sentence from all other Quarg got removed.
description: Adds a new system 'Saquerver' (between human and coalition space) where you can farm a new Quarg faction. Also the death sentence from all other Quarg got removed. See the README for details.

name: QOL-Outfits
shortDescription: An offshoot of my Amalgamation plugin from 4 years ago, I wanted to bring some of the old QOL outfits from that collection of plugins back into the modern Endless Sky landscape. Hope you enjoy.
description:
Hi I am the original author of the Amalgamation plugin, while I have gotten back into Endless Sky recently my ideas of polish have changed greatly over these 4 years.
I decided that while I wasn't satisfied with Amalgamation as a whole, many of the outfits from plugins like Shields up were still interesting to me, and something I wanted in the game all these years later.
So rather than uploading a massive plugin that turns away many people by its sheer size again, I would upload this, a small quality of life plugin that adds many of the smaller outfits I personally believe make building ships more fun overall.
I am also working on an independent plugin for the Shields Up 'Mil'taj' race, since that was where I put the most effort and had the most interest when making Amalgamation back in the day.
This Plugin adds a new armoury outfit that allows you to equip powerful boarding weaponry, while costing upkeep and space. A smaller outfit space expansion, external fuel pods, extended bunk rooms, a handful of basic human outfits to add a slight bit of variation and huge tier 5 radiant engines along with a small tier 0.
No other plugins are needed with this and implementation into the grander game is minimal outside of outfitters, since most of these are mostly for player use rather than to make AI ships more interesting.
Reccomended Plugins
https://github.com/demolish238/Mil-taj-Protectorate/tree/main (Mil'taj Protectorate) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/Korath-Retribution (Korath Retribution) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/Capitalis-Major (Capitalis Major) (My other plugin)
Used Plugins
https://github.com/Amazinite/Shields-Up (Shields Up)
https://github.com/Amazinite/Enigma-Corp (Enigma Corps)
https://www.nexusmods.com/endlesssky/mods/1 (Space Conversion)
If you have any feedback on balance problems or bugs please message me on discord (demolish238#6398)

name: Quaernan Start
shortDescription: ES Custom start.  Quaernan Humans are a Tier 3 civilization with human expansionism at its peak around the 31st century; started by the Syndicate stoking innovation and to forestall a galactic recession.
description: An endless sky plugin that adds an extremely powerful set of ships and missions accessed via a custom start, intended for testing other extremely strong plugin factions or just generally playing around with.

name: Space Shuttle Start
shortDescription: An alternate start plugin featuring an old Earth relic.
description: Start in the Sol system with an old Earth relic for your ship. The space shuttle has no weapons, but lots of cargo space.

name: Spacefarer
shortDescription: One Jump Drive; No ship capturing; No plundering installed outfits.
description: As a captain, you're responsible for the lives of your crew.  Loss of life is inevitable in the merciless reaches of space.  You stick to exploration, ferrying, and fleet combat.  If anyone dies, it will be everyone when the ship explodes.  This plugin adds replay value by forcing the player to discover alternate and competing forms of income in order to efficiently obtain a fleet.

name: Core Mining, Inc.
shortDescription: Adds another storyline in the early game, following a business getting started in Syndicate space.
description: The Core Mining, Inc. plugin adds a storyline that offers you the chance to work for a newly started company by the same name. You start with them from the very beginning and help build up the company. Along the way, you can make different choices which may impact the game at a later time, as well as potentially make major changes to the plotline. Not everything is in place at the current time, but this plugin should fit in seamlessly with the the vanilla game.

name: ES-Advanced-Starts
shortDescription: Adds more starting options to Endless-Sky.
description: Adds several new starts to Endless-Sky including Syndicate and Deep starts.

name: Korath Retribution
shortDescription: Hello, this plugin adds consequences for Worldship hunting, from the Quarg being disapproving, to Korath Revenge fleets and the Efreti being angered.
description:
Hello, this plugin adds consequences for Worldship hunting, from the Quarg being disapproving, to Korath Revenge fleets and the Efreti being angered.
Reccomended Plugins
https://github.com/MidnightPlugins/Lost-in-Midnight (Lost in Midnight) (Allows you a chance to get a capturable Korsmanath A'awoj unlike in vanilla, also just a good plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/Mil-taj-Protectorate/tree/main (Mil'taj Protectorate) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/QOL-Outfits (QOL outfits) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/Capitalis-Major (Capitalis Major) (My other plugin)
If you have any feedback on balance problems or bugs please message me on discord (demolish238#6398)

name: Logbook Help
shortDescription: Adds a Help tab to the Logbook which can be used as a centralized location to review or preview various helpful game tips.
description: Adds a Help tab to the Logbook which can be used as a centralized location to review or preview various helpful game tips.

name: The Quazar Condundrom
shortDescription: An Odyssey Spanning 100 years
description: The Quazar Conundrum is a massive century spanning story involving a galaxy-spanning threat, changing hegemony and new factions rising to power.

name: Factory.Outlets
shortDescription: Adds Factory Outlet Stations around the HQ planets of shipyard companies, where basically only ship hulls with just few essential outfits are sold.
description: Adds Factory Outlet Stations around the HQ planets of shipyard companies, where basically only ship hulls (with just few essential outfits) are sold, such reducing the price significantly.

name: captureable.person.ships
shortDescription: Makes person ships capturable.
description: Makes person ships capturable. See the README for details.

name: mission.helper
shortDescription: Enables a job on every planet's job board, that shows missions you haven't done.
description: Enables a job on every planet's job board, that shows missions you haven't done. It also shows the 'source' and 'to offer' of these missions, so you can easily find them. See the README for details.

name: Mil'taj Protectorate
shortDescription: This plugin contains the Mil'taj race placed in the right arm of the galaxy, they can be found by exploring the Gegno region of space.
description:
Hi I am the original author of the Amalgamation plugin, while I have gotten back into Endless Sky recently my ideas of polish have changed greatly over these 4 years.
I decided that while I wasn't satisfied with Amalgamation as a whole, but a race of aliens from the plugin Shields up were still interesting to me, and something I wanted in the game all these years later.
This is my attempt to morph the Mil'taj into their own fully functional developed race, with a simple opening mission chain and plenty of lore.
It is recommended to avoid the Mil'taj storyline until you can at least defeat a Wardragon, otherwise you will have a bad time.
ATM you can choose to either align yourself with the Mil'taj against the Quarg, or make them an enemy. I do not plan to ever have a Quarg side to the campaign, they just want you to piss off.
Currently something I cannot do myself is art. So the mil'taj licences are just wanderer licences until I can get custom ones.
For the rest of the plugin all art assets are taken from dead plugins that years ago I worked on updating to the then current game version.
The idealised goal would be to replace them all with custom assets just for this plugin, but I doubt that will happen, so I'm mainly hoping someone will be interested in adding their own custom made Mil'taj licences for the plugin.
Reccomended Plugins
https://github.com/1010todd/Beyond-the-Sky (Beyond the Sky) (Makes the Quarg actually scary as a threat and makes the higher tier Mil'taj ships make sense in comparison)
https://github.com/demolish238/QOL-Outfits (QOL outfits) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/Korath-Retribution (Korath Retribution) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/Capitalis-Major (Capitalis Major) (My other plugin)
Used Plugins
https://github.com/Amazinite/Shields-Up (Shields Up) (The original creator of the Mil'taj)
https://github.com/Makuta-Miras/The-Enclave/tree/master (Enclave) (For Mil'taj weapons and outfits)
https://github.com/mdsmestad/ES-COTSA-Pluggin (Cultures of the Southern Arm) (For the Avendri Ships)
https://tearcellgames.itch.io/cosmic-canidae-assets (Mal'korbra assets)
https://github.com/MidnightPlugins/Lost-in-Midnight (Lost in Midnight) (Damaged Jump Drive Image)
If you have any feedback on balance problems or bugs please message me on discord (demolish238#6398)

name: landing.images.highres
shortDescription: High resolution files for landing.images plugin.
description: High resolution files for landing.images plugin. See the README for details.

name: Arion - Air Superiority
shortDescription: Plugin that adds a bunch of interesting things, mainly some modern military planes and weapons.
description:
An Endless Sky plugin that adds a variety of things to endless sky, including:
-Real life fighters
-Real life bombers
-Ace combat super planes
-Xenonauts fighters
-A bunch of new H2H weapons based on real life weapons
-Advanced outfits
-Specialized weapons
-Superweapons
-Custom capital ships
-1 (or 2) new 'short campaigns' and some new jobs
-ETC
Special thanks to 1010todd, yuyuko_saigyouji. and gefulltetaubenbrust for some of the sprites.

name: space.fauna
shortDescription: Adds space fauna fleets to all systems. Useless but pretty, to make the universe more alive.
description: Adds space fauna fleets to all systems. Useless but pretty, to make the universe more alive. See the README for details.

name: expert.crew.members
shortDescription: Adds unique crew members, aquireable through low chance spaceport missions.
description: Adds unique crew members, aquireable through low chance spaceport missions. These crew members are technically outfits which require a bunk and a salary, but no outfit space or mass. They add, depending on their technology field, stats to your ship. Like shield regeneration, more thrust, more cargo etc. See the README for details.

name: ES-ui-upgrades
shortDescription: A plugin that aims to transform the UI.
description: This plugin aims to be the first plugin to transform the UI. It tries to make it into a more digital interface, with floating transparent blue windows.

name: more.arfectas
shortDescription: Adds the new system 'Mego Pug', in eastern Bunrodea space. There you can farm rare spawning Arfectas and other more common Pug ships.
description: Adds the new system 'Mego Pug', in eastern Bunrodea space. There you can farm rare spawning Arfectas and other more common Pug ships, without ruining your Pug reputation. See the README for details.

name: bunrodea.missions
shortDescription: Adds some missions and jobs to increase the Bunrodea reputation, to get access to all their planets and stuff.  See the README for details.
description: Adds some missions and jobs to increase the Bunrodea reputation. The first mission is available after the vanilla first contact mission. Doing more jobs will allow you to get access to all their planets and ships. See the README for details.

name: Midnight Scrapyard
shortDescription: A plugin suggesting an epilogue for the Kor Sestor region of Endless Sky. Includes some new ships, outfits, and missions.
description: This region of space has abandoned derelicts waiting to be scavenged. But something lurks amongst the wreckage...

name: High DPI
shortDescription: High-DPI graphics for Endless Sky.
description: This plugin contains double resolution graphics, which are only used if you have a high-dpi monitor or if you set the zoom level above 100%. This will roughly double the amount of memory used by the game.

name: Better Vanilla Pirates
shortDescription: Makes pirates more interesting, varied, with many more pirate fighting missions.
description: Adds 30+ high end variants for human heavy warships and marauders using a wide variety of outfit combinations. These will be seen in pirate fleets, merchant fleets, and adds 30+ new pirate hunting/defence/blockade missions. Adds new "Bounty Hunted" fleets that will hunt you down without warning. Adds new "Korath Raid" missions in certain Syndicate systems where the Korath will attack with their Sestor/Mereti drones, allowing you to capture these ships post-Wanderer campaign.

name: automata.destruction.0percent
shortDescription: Modifies the self destruction chance of Sestor and Mereti ships to a value of 0.0 (0%).
description: Modifies the self destruction chance of Sestor and Mereti ships to a value of 0.0 (0%). See the README for details.

name: kestrel.unlocks
shortDescription: Unlocks all Kestrel variants after you have unlocked the first one.
description: Unlocks all Kestrel variants after you have unlocked the first one. See the README for details.

name: Crisis in Management
shortDescription: Alternate start in Syndicate space, with a story parallel to the main plot.
description: Crisis in Management is an alternate start in the Syndicate, the story of a manger who quits managing and start piloting. Leave your failing company and take to the stars to escape repercussions, then find yourself in the background, behind the scenes of Endless Sky's main storyline. Beyond that, the same endless sky awaits.

name: uniques
shortDescription: Removes mass and outfit space from some uniques, puts others into unique category, or gives a png if there isn't one. Also adds lots of new uniques.
description: Removes mass and outfit space from some uniques, puts others into unique category, or gives a png if there isn't one. Also adds lots of new uniques. See the README for details.

name: ship.merging
shortDescription: This plugin allows you to merge several ships of the same type into one with improved attributes. This can be done several times, up to a T10 ship.
description: This plugin allows you to merge several ships of the same type into one with improved attributes. This can be done several times, up to a T10 ship. See the README for details.

name: Prism Plugin
shortDescription: Allows you to change your ship swizzle(colors, sort of) easily in game.
description: The plugin adds missions on every star that let you change your fleet swizzle to a few options. When you start the game you get access to two, eventually you will find all 6. Look in the about.txt file for spoilers on where to get em. It should be mostly lore friendly.

name: Endless Cargo
shortDescription: Intermodal shipping containers for Endless Sky
description: Adds shipping containers, container ships, and missions involving using the latter to deliver the former to places all over the galaxy.

name: paint.your.ships
shortDescription: Offers a job on Earth to paint your ships.
description: Offers a job on Earth to paint your ships. See the README for details.

name: highrollers.ltd
shortDescription: This plugin adds some casino space stations where you can gamble.
description: This plugin adds some casino space stations where you can gamble. See the README for details.

name: Jimmys-Ship-Emporium
shortDescription: Adds the Navy Glaive.
description: Simply adds the Glaive, a spicy Republic Navy ship produced after the Kor Sestor incursion.

name: DAIS
shortDescription: An additional ships plugin for Endless Sky.
description: DAIS provides a collection of lovingly-modeled ships with thumbnails and well-balanced stats, along with the fleet and shipyard additions to make them appear in the course of gameplay.

name: Lemuria's Extra ES Stuff
shortDescription: Extra ES Stuff by Lemuria. May contain traces of Sayari.
description: A general plugin that adds a new set of systems to explore near the Deep, data drives, and data delivery missions. No ships. As for the Illumina and Illuria systems, beware name confusion! The dockworkers will be very angry.

name: combat.ai
shortDescription: Offers a mission to install a combat AI, which increases your ship stats based on combat experience.
description: Offers a mission to install a combat AI, which increases your ship stats based on combat experience. See the README for details.

name: Outfit Highlighter
shortDescription: Makes the selected outfit stand out more in the outfitter screen.
description: Makes the selected outfit stand out more in the outfitter screen. Recommended for those who prefer to navigate the outfitter using the keyboard instead of the mouse. Now includes themed highlighters! To change themes, copy the image from the chosen theme's subfolder and paste into the plugin's ui folder.

name: Jaws
shortDescription: Completely harmless space wildlife, which you can randomly shoot at. Trust me.
description: Completely harmless space wildlife, which you can randomly shoot at. Trust me.

name: hai.side.mission.unlocker
shortDescription: Unlocks following hai missions... Unwanted Cargo Trigger, Hiding in Plain Sight, Nanachi 1,Expanding Business 1 and Hai Reveal... Pirate Troubles 0.
description: Unlocks following hai missions... Unwanted Cargo Trigger, Hiding in Plain Sight, Nanachi 1,Expanding Business 1 and Hai Reveal... Pirate Troubles 0. If there are followups they work too. Also Devil-Run related systems are shown now. See the README for details.

name: additional.command.buttons.radial
shortDescription: Reworks the ui for the ANDROID version of ES.
description: Reworks the main buttons ui on the lower right side. Made for the ANDROID version of ES. See the README for details.

name: Yestrel
shortDescription: Adds a Kestrel variant with all possible upgrades in one (with 18 gun ports!)
description: Adds a Kestrel variant with all possible upgrades in one (with 18 gun ports!) after you have unlocked the first one. After completing the Kestrel mission chain, the new variant is unlocked after 4 months and you are notified about it. If you activate this plugin after you have already completed the missions, the timer starts from then. Credits: Kassandra Haruki, Zuckung (troubleshooter, in addition, this plugin was inspired by and based on kestrel.unlocks) Zoura (troubleshooter) timeout.fu (troubleshooter)

name: Tugderic's Addons
shortDescription: a plugin i made for fun that adds missions, outfits, wandering fleets, merchant Company and a pirate Gang.
description: it's just a lil plugin i made for fun, it adds some fleets to human space, a Government of Friendly Merchant who can Escort you if they like you enough, A strong pirate gang wandering through the galaxy, unlockable outfits, and some missions, also some things out of human space.

name: show.reputation
shortDescription: Enables a job on the Earth job board, that shows the reputation values.
description: Enables a job on the Earth job board, that shows the reputation values. See the README for details.

name: Solar.Sails
shortDescription: Diffractive solar sails for Human and Coalition space, providing thrust, turn and solar collection, at that being outfitspace-efficient.
description: Epic diffractive solar sails for Human and Coalition space, providing thrust, turn and solar collection, at that using only outfitspace worth of half the consumed enginespace.

name: Kinetic Weaponry
shortDescription: Adds current-day weaponry to Endless Sky
description: A plugin adding modern realistic weapons to Endless Sky. They are tier 1 human weapons, already balanced to work as anti-capital ship weapons.

name: Bunsen.Burner
shortDescription: Next-generation Flamethrower, as gun, turret and h2h. For those who like it hot.
description: Next-generation Flamethrower, as gun, turret and h2h. For those who like it hot.

name: sensor
shortDescription: A small mod, adds SOME weapons.
description: Adds a lot of weapons, (:

name: The Enclave
shortDescription: The Enclave focuses around the discovery of an isolated group of humans in a distant galaxy. Separated from the rest of their species for over half a millennium, how have these people developed?
description: The Enclave is a story-driven plugin focused on the discovery of an isolated group of humans stranded, hundreds of years ago, in another galaxy. I'd recommend you have a large Tier 2 fleet at least to complete the (admittedly still in-progress) story. Special thanks to Derpy Horse (https://github.com/Amazinite) for adding the animated stars.

name: Arc Over
shortDescription: Arc Over is a plug-in for Endless Sky that gives vanilla ships limited turret arcs, introducing a new aspect to combat balance.
description: Arc Over implements limited turret arcs for turret mounts on vanilla ships, resulting a new balance for ship combat. Smaller ships will enjoy navigating the more limited fields of fire from larger ships, where these arc limits provide more dynamic engagements between ships of any size.

name: Fighter Factory
shortDescription: Add outfit to produce replacement fighters. Updated to latest stable.
description: Add outfit to produce replacement fighters. To use, after installing the Fighter Assembler outfit depart and land once then check the job board to record the current number of fighters. Now if the number of fighter ever drop below the recorded number new one will be made to replace it as long as supply is available. Will be updated to latest stable release.

name: automata.in.human.space
shortDescription: Brings jump drive equipped automata into human space after the wanderer campaign.
description: Brings jump drive equipped automata into human space after the wanderer campaign. See the README for details.

name: Exporianes
shortDescription: Adds a new race of T5 Aliens.
description: Adds a new race of T5 aliens to a new galaxy. They can be reached after completing the Emerald Sword missions and having a combat rating of 13.

name: The Adamas Project
shortDescription: Adds a very advanced race of aliens to the northeast section of the galaxy.
description: This plugin adds a race of highly advanced Tier 2 - 3 aliens known as the Adamas to the northeast section of the galaxy, accessible through wormholes. The aliens are friendly, but they have their own versions of pirates. The Scavengers have their own galaxy that they live in, and from which they mount raids upon the Adamas. Be careful you do not get in their way, as some of their ships are armed with stolen quarg tech!

name: planet.map
shortDescription: This is a storyline entirely on a planets surface(with fitting visuals). Available at the outfitter on planet Memory.
description: This is a storyline entirely on a planets surface(with fitting visuals). Available at the outfitter on planet Memory. See the README for details.

name: Jibauni
shortDescription: Adds three new alien species.
description: Adds the Jibauni, Diba, and re-adds the Sheragi. The Jibauni are dinosaurs, the Diba are robots, and the Sheragi are dragons.

name: better.starts
shortDescription: Adds several new start options with different ships, background stories, credits and debts.
description: Adds several new start options with different ships, background stories, credits and debts. See the README for details.

name: flare.play
shortDescription: Adds lots of engine flare outfits to the big shipyards and outfitters. These outfits are just cosmetic.
description: Adds lots of engine flare outfits to the big shipyards and outfitters. These outfits are just cosmetic. Idea by 'Thermognuclear Missile' on discord. See the README for details.

name: Korunak.Defense.Drones
shortDescription: Korunak Robotics provides combat drones from primitive missile sponges to innovative fighting machines, popular among merchants, but not only.
description: Korunak Robotics provides combat drones from primitive missile sponges to innovative fighting machines, popular among merchants, but not only.

name: disable.spaceport.repeatables
shortDescription: Disables all repeatable spaceport missions. I.e. shady passenger transport or drug smuggling.
description: Disables all repeatable spaceport missions. I.e. shady passenger transport, drug smuggling, time critical transport or defend planet. See the README for details.

name: Ciu Kreo
shortDescription: A feature-rich all-content plugin with both content creators and general users in mind.
description: An all-content plugin for Endless Sky. To be used to assist in content creation, or just for general use.

name: Midnight Expansion
shortDescription: Plugin using ships, outfits, or other resources from plugins by other creators or derivatives of their original creations.
description: Expanded content derived from the plugins of other creators. Some contents may require other Midnight Plugins creations.

name: outfits.weapon.slot
shortDescription: Adds several non-weapon outfits for gun and turret ports.
description: Adds several non-weapon outfits for gun and turret ports. See the README for details.

name: Galactic War
shortDescription: A large content plugin adding a whole new galaxy with over dozens of aliens with storylines(in progress).
description: A large content plugin adding 1 Accessible galaxy, 16+ Races with their own ships and outfits. Technologies ranging from less than human to beyond even the Drak, in total of over 100 Ships, 400 Outfits, and 1500 Systems. To access the galaxy you will need a Jump Drive, head to the north(top) most system in the Wanderer space, wormhole system will be close by.

name: Fire Corporation Plugin
shortDescription: A plugin about an manufacturing faction called Fire Corporation that hates pirates and will not allow them to have their ships. Contributions welcome!
description: Fire Corporation is a manufacturing faction that makes several human ships. They hate pirates, and will try their best to keep them away from their ships. Please help by contributing to the storyline!

name: Main Plot Plus
shortDescription: A plugin mostly centered around improving the main plot.
description: Have you ever had trouble getting the Free Worlds campaign to start, or accidentally failed a key mission? Have you ever thought that all sides were equally bad or wanted to join an unimplemented side? Have you ever wondered what happened to the Mark II Syndicate ships? Well, you will not be able to join the Navy, and joining the Syndicate requires the Crisis in Management plugin, but otherwise, this plugin is for you.

name: A Coalition at War
shortDescription: Pick a side in the war between the Coalition and Quarg. I am looking for story and mission suggestions https://github.com/mathwhiz1212/A-Coalition-At-War/
description: You hear a lot about the conflict between the Coalition and the Quarg in Endless Sky, but you never see it. This plugin introduces a storyline that lets you see or join that conflict. You can loot Quarg ships or capture Heliarch ships depending on the side you choose. You can start the few implemented missions by landing on "Tebuteb's Table" in the Tebuteb system and accept the anamoly mission. Please consider helping to add more misisons and stories https://github.com/mathwhiz1212/A-Coalition-At-War/issues/new/choose

name: A Conscience Plugin
shortDescription: You get more help from the Quarg so you don't have to kill civilians by dropping a big bomb on Zenith.
description: I may add more "conscience" adjustments in the future, but for now, you get more help from the Quarg to destroy the Korath drones. This allows you to not kill civilians on Zenith and not need to capture a Korath war fleet to accomplish that.

name: Lost in Midnight
shortDescription: Lost in Midnight is a mission focused plugin for the Endless Sky game. Features new missions, systems, outfits, ships, and variants.
description: Lost technology, Lost knowledge, And people, who have lost their way trying to navigate life in this vast galaxy...

name: gegno.pirates
shortDescription: Adds a new faction of Gegno pirates which lets you capture Gegno ships and gain Gegno/Scin/Vi reputation to open their planets for travel.
description: Adds a new faction of Gegno pirates which lets you capture Gegno ships, gain Gegno/Scin/Vi reputation, open their planets for travel, loot Gegno licenses and create an outfitter/shipyard for all their gear. See the README for details.

name: Louise.Conglomerate.Shipyards
shortDescription: Ships made by Louise Conglomerate, designed for harsh pirate-infested frontier areas, at that being beautiful. Needs Fundamental.Outfit.Expansion.
description: The ships manufactured by the Louise Conglomerate, based on Follower, are designed for the harsh pirate-infested frontier areas, at that showing a remarkable sense for beauty. Requires Fundamental.Outfit.Expansion.

name: Early Starts
shortDescription: Start the game at one of five earlier dates
description: Real simple. Start the same way, in the same place, but earlier. Why? The big reason would be more time before the plot kicks off (which is date-based). You can use that time to get started on quests that are unavailable after the plot starts, or to prep yourself well for the main plot, or just to play for years without having to worry about the plot.

name: Fundamental.Outfit.Expansion
shortDescription: A collection of essential outfits from various plugins of various authors which should be vanilla, but incomprehensibly aren't.
description: A collection of essential outfits from various plugins of various authors which should be vanilla, but incomprehensibly aren't.

name: kor.efret.shipyard
shortDescription: Adds a shipyard with the three Kor Efret ships to Laki Nemparu. Also adds an outfitter with all outfits of these three ships and some Korath Exiles outfits.
description: Adds a shipyard with the three Kor Efret ships to Laki Nemparu(Kashikt) in Kor Efret space. Also adds an outfitter with all outfits of these three ships and some Korath Exiles outfits. See the README for details.

name: no.more.mereti.mines
shortDescription: Removes the mines from Mereti ships and replaces them with Husk-Slice and Shield Disruptor guns to increase game performance.
description: Removes the mines from Mereti ships and replaces them with Husk-Slice and Shield Disruptor guns to increase game performance. See the README for details.

name: HyperHue-Studios
shortDescription: In-Game access to all 29 vanilla swizzles.
description: This plugin creates game play to swizzle your ship to any of the 29 vanilla swizzles. To begin, visit any human planet.

name: BetterVanillaHai
shortDescription: Adds Hai ships with a wide variety of human/Hai outfits to human fleets in the late-game. Spices up pirate combat and adds variety.
description: Check the readme file for detailed information.

name: Portraits for News
shortDescription: This plugin re-activates the portrait system for news in ES.
description: This plugin re-activates the portrait system for news in ES. All the images for portraits are already in the game, but became unused after portraits for news was disabled by default. Alien portraits (including transhuman portraits) are not considered canon.

name: Beccas Endless Expansion
shortDescription: New weapons, outfits and ships for many factions of the game Endless Sky, all with new sprites close to the vanilla ones!
description: New weapons, outfits and ships for many factions of the game Endless Sky, all with new sprites close to the vanilla ones! All you have to do is explore, fly in your ship and meet all the factions in the game.

name: Zone.of.Control
shortDescription: Tribute human space after finishing the main plot without need for save-edits or being dependent on time slots during campaign. Handles special cases.
description: Provides a proper way to tribute human space after finishing the main plot without needing to save-edit (Free Worlds) or being dependent on time slots during campaign (Republic & Syndicate). Also handles independent systems by defining own polities to avoid issues with independent mission NPCs. And adds some vanilla mission chain related candy.

name: Endless Sky Starbridge Pack
shortDescription: Get Yer Starbridges here! Adds the Starbridge from EVN to Endless Skies, Mod Starbridge and Railgun Starbridge variants included!
description: Get Yer Starbridges here! Adds the Starbridge from EVN to Endless Skies, Mod Starbridge and Railgun Starbridge variants included! Also, two types of infinite ammunition railguns have been added for the authentic EVN experience. The ships and weapons can be bought from various advanced shipyards and outfitters. As a fallback, all Starbridge variants and outfits featured in this mod are available at any Syndicate Advanced shipyard.

name: All Content Plugin
shortDescription: Endless Sky plugin giving the player access to all ships and outfits.
description: This plugin was made to allow content creators to have access to all outfits in a single place, for the purpose of designing and testing outfit loadouts for new ships. Of course, it can also be used by people who want to ruin the game for themselves by getting a massive fleet without needing to work for it.

name: Gaguka
shortDescription: Adds a new alien race.
description: Adds my alien species the Gaguka. They are located in their own galaxy which can be accessed by a wormhole east of Gegno space.

name: High DPI Continuous
shortDescription: High-DPI graphics for Endless Sky.
description: This plugin contains double resolution graphics, which are only used if you have a high-dpi monitor or if you set the zoom level above 100%. This will roughly double the amount of memory used by the game.

name: landing.images
shortDescription: Replaces all planet landing images with better fitting ones.
description: Replaces all planet landing images with better fitting ones. See the README for details.

name: galactic.capital.investment
shortDescription: Implements missions and jobs for banking services and investments.
description: Implements missions and jobs for banking services and investments. Available in human, quarg and hai space. See the README for details.

name: control.station
shortDescription: Adds a station to the Sol system that offers administrative functions started by the job board.
description: Adds a station to the Sol system that offers administrative functions started by the job board. See the README for details.

name: Cromha Expansion Plugin
shortDescription: Add new high-tier and low-tier factions and expand the existing one. Adds different new storyline and introduce new gameplay mechanics.
description: Adds a new civilization to the Korath Space (now named the 'Empire Space'): The Cromha Empire. Also known as 'The Empire', it is a government that dirige a huge part of the north of the Milky Way. It also a very high advanced government. They are human but don't directly have contact with human Merchants, they have contact with the Syndicate, the Republic but they don't allow them to enter their territory. Know more about the plugin in the wiki! (or test the game yourself)

name: Omnis
shortDescription: The most extensive all-content plugin to date, for development or fun.
description:
The most extensive all-content plugin to date. All vanilla content and the content of many plugins available to use to put together different ship builds. Many more tools are included into Omnis too!
This plugin is part of the Adde Endless Sky collection.

name: tribute.republic
shortDescription: Allows you to tribute all Republic planets, without losing Free Worlds or Deep Security reputation.
description: Allows you to tribute all Republic planets, without losing Free Worlds or Deep Security reputation. See the README for details.

name: Easier Korath Automatons
shortDescription: Makes capturing Korath Automata easier.
description: Decreases self-destructing chances by half to make capturing the Korath automata ships easier.

name: Sheragi Rebirth
shortDescription: Plugin for Endless Sky that reintroduces the Sheragi.
description: Play through a new breath of content reviving the most mysterious species, the Sheragi.

name: Capitalis Major
shortDescription: A collection of four superheavy ships, each with their own missions to unlock them, all of which are only avaliable after the main story has been finished.
description:
A collection of four superheavy ships, each with their own missions to unlock them, all of which are only avaliable after the main story has been finished.
Plugins
https://github.com/demolish238/Mil-taj-Protectorate/tree/main (Mil'taj Protectorate) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/QOL-Outfits (QOL outfits) (My other plugin)
https://github.com/demolish238/Korath-Retribution (Korath Retribution) (My other plugin)
Credits
Darcy Manoel (Aesalon)
https://github.com/Amazinite/Shields-Up (Shields Up) (For Kriegsmacher and Monolith)
Unknown (Detainer Turret, Kar Ik Vot 927)
If you have any feedback on balance problems or bugs please message me on discord (demolish238#6398)

name: snowfeather.robotics
shortDescription: Adds three missions that lead to adding androids to the outfitter on Snowfeather(Hai space).
description: Adds three missions that lead to adding androids to the outfitter on Snowfeather(Hai space). Starts on Snowfeather(Bore Fah) when having at least one android installed. See the README for details.

name: too.many.asteroids
shortDescription: Removes all non-mineable asteroids from all systems. Mineable asteroids and asteroid belts are untouched. Increases game performance.
description: Removes all non-mineable asteroids from all systems. Mineable asteroids and asteroid belts are untouched. Increases game performance. See the README for details.

name: jump.gates
shortDescription: Adds a ring of 'jump gates' at the borders of human space to create shortcuts inside the human space.
description: Adds a ring of 'jump gates' at the borders of human space to create shortcuts inside the human space. See the README for details.
